body: Please translate this, someone please. The art is amazing, I love everything about this story, but I can't read it. I've read some alright Danganronpa stories, but this one is just amazing, I've never wanted to read a story more. Someone PLEASE, find it deep in your heart to translate this story. I can do nothing but HOPE that someone translates this, because there is nothing I can do. All I want to do is read my doujins but I can't, because I don't know what it says. Please. please. please. please. please. ijustneedtoreadmydanganronpastoriessomeonepleasetranslatethisstoryyyyy. I will pray to Atua all night, until this story gets translated.
I love the art so muchhhh! Now we see nagito’s true intentions for chp 5 😂
I guess I have to celebrate it's good actually
It's finally here, been searching for the full doujin years ago. Thank you!
